title: mri_hausdorff_dist
description: Tool for computing the mean or max of the minimum distances between point sets in 3D volumes.

threshold.title: Binarize Threshold
threshold.description: Binarize input volumes with given threshold

input_file_flag.title: Input File Flag
input_file_flag.description: Read volumes from an input file (first argument is the input filename)

blur_sigma.title: Gaussian Blur Sigma
blur_sigma.description: Blur the input image with Gaussian of specified sigma

max_flag.title: Max Distance Flag
max_flag.description: Compute the maximum of the minimum distances instead of the mean

label_index.title: Label Index
label_index.description: Use specified label index as the target label
